text: Ronald Saunders (6 November 1932 â€“ 7 December 2019) was an English football player and manager. He played for Everton, Gillingham, Portsmouth, Watford and Charlton Athletic. He managed seven clubs in 20 years, and he was the only manager to have taken charge of Aston Villa, Birmingham City and West Bromwich Albion. He died on 7 December 2019, aged 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Cheshire Category:Watford F.C. players
title: Ron Saunders
